segments.text: Excuse me ? Can you do me a favor , please ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: It's my pleasure , what can I do for you ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I'm from England and I'm trying to make a travel plan for today .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I'm a flight attendant and I'm here on vacation .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I live in the Holiday Inn Lido Hotel .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Oh , it's not very far . And as far as I know it is a fancy place .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Yes , it is . Do you know where I can get a town map ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Great , do you have any for foreigners ? I mean English version ?
segments.speaker: S1
